# gitlev-server

## Front
https://github.com/aki85/gtp-front

## Environment
* nodejs: ^12.x
* yarn: ^1.9

## Installation
yarn

## dev

### dynamodb

yarn run dynamo
yarn run dynamo-win

### create local table

aws dynamodb create-table --cli-input-json file://./migrations/accountsTable.json --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000

### dev server
yarn run dev

curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"query":"query{account{name, githubInfo{alias}, githubAnalysis{involvedLanguages{name, color, size, level}}}}"}' -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..P7AUMAef8csh24iMNlwgUfAGlQJ2vBKUknz4ng-yxA8" localhost:3001/graphql
